posts.post_title: SGC Graded Old Judge For Sale/Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jay
The following Old Judge are available for purchase at the price indicated below or are available for trade. Requests for scans, etc should be directed to my email address (oldjudge@gmail.com).

Pete Gillespie: Bat at ready, L/handed---SGC80.............$700
Jocko Milligan: Bat in R/hand at side---SGC50..............$350
Billy Sunday: Catch, bending/L, hands thigh high---SGC40...$750
Tommy McCarthy: Catch, hands outstretched/L head high---SGC20....$750
Henry Boyle: Bat at ready at 60 degrees---SGC60............$400
Will Fry*: Stooping to field grounder---SGC10...............$400

*--Scarcer player
